##### Instructions
The series selected in tab "Individual Series Correlations" can be edited here.
1. Scroll the Window Center slider to the area of the series you want to edit.
2. Adjust the Window Width slider. The table on the right will scroll to those measurements.
3. Click on a row in the table to select a measurement to edit. 
4. Edit using "Remove Row" or "Add Row."
5. Review the "Individual Series Correlations" tabs to assess effect of the edits.
6. Select other series as needed.
7. Click "Revert" to undo your edits or "Download" to write out the edited *rwl* file.
